argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvrcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | dvrcl.o | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 |  | dvrcl.d | |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invr ` R ) = ( invr ` R ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 2, 5, 3 | #P_dvrval | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 5, 1 | #P_ringinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. U ) -> ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) e. B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 1, 4 | #P_ringcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) e. B ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syld3an3 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) e. B ) |
